name: Follow The Light (LeoTheCatMeow)
description: Follow The Light is a semester long project for my 3D video game class. It features 2 parts. The first part, Into Darkness, is a personal narrative of mine, portraying my journey of finding faith and escaping persecution. The second part, Storm and Rain, is meant to be an extension of my message set in a rainy dark woods. It is however, unfinished - due to time limit of the semester. In this project, I attempt to explore the graphic capability of Unity, experimenting with different shaders and post-processing effects.
